resources.string: We\'re going to redirect you to the Talenport page so you can make your payment.
You are 3 steps away from discovering your main talents. To achieve them, you must answer the phases:

The diagnosis is divided into 3 stages, it consists of a series of sentences that will appear in pairs. From each pair, you should choose the sentence that expresses how you are and select the emoji that best describes you. You will have 30 seconds to respond to each sentence. In case both sentences or neither describe you, you can select the emoji in the middle.
Search for activities or projects where you can put your talents into action.
Make sure to know the talents of the people close to you and leverage them for better results.
Enhance the work of others with what you do best and faster.
There are no good or bad talents; seek to make the most of them to improve your performance and achieve your goals.

Now that you know your talents, remember that what's important is not the name of the talent but how you put it into practice through four key questions:

1. How do you build strong relationships with others?
2. How do you solve problems?
3. What motivates you?
4. What activities do you perform with greater speed and precision?
While having a conversation, your mind highlights aspects that are
You enjoy competing to always be the number 1
We will improve your professional experience.
